title: Durga Puja 2025: Kolkata pandals making headlines with political and AI themes
description: Kolkata’s Durga Puja stands out for its unique and creative themes, ranging from the past to the future. title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Warns US Export Controls On China May Have Backfired: 'They're Nanoseconds Behind Us'
description: Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ: NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang has hinted that U.S. policies aimed at slowing China's artificial intelligence progress might have instead accelerated domestic competitors like Huawei Technologies.

title: Huawei to Double Output of Top AI Chip as Nvidia Wavers in China
description: Huawei Technologies Co. is preparing to sharply ramp up production of its most advanced artificial intelligence chips over the next year, aiming to win customers in the world’s biggest semiconductor market while Nvidia Corp. struggles with geopolitical headwinds.

title: Lufthansa airline to cut 4K jobs by 2030 with help of AI
description: Lufthansa Group said Monday that it would shed 4,000 jobs by 2030 with the help of artificial intelligence, digitalization and consolidating work among member airlines — even as the company reported strong demand for air travel and predicted stronger profits in years ahead.

title: SAP CFO says AI will replace jobs: We can do the same work with fewer people
description: SAP's CFO and CEO are candid about artificial intelligence reshaping how work gets done—AI-powered automation is poised to allow the software giant, and similar companies, to maintain output with fewer employees. Their comments highlight both possibilities and challenges as major organizations adapt to rapid shifts, aiming to avoid losing ground in the race to adopt new technology.
content: Artificial Intelligence is changing our world. While people are getting more dependent on AI, the companies are moving to automation with the help of advanced LLMs. Big tech companies including SAP are adopting AI as a key driver of productivity, out... [2706 chars]

title: Kyivstar Launches Locally Hosted AI Platform In Its Cloud
